item.description:
Join us for our 2nd Annual Columbus Day lunch! Join fellow foodies for a fun Columbus Day lunch @ your "I" restaurant! We're venturing to the northwest corner of the South Shore for today's lunch! This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a good opportunity to discuss future Dining Out events.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Columbus Day Lunch
Monday, October 13th @ 12:30pm
Isabella Restaurant
566 High Street
Dedham, MA 02026
781-461-8485
www.isabellarestaurant.com

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Organizer(s): Angela

Min/Max: There is a minimum of at least 6 people by Noon on Friday, October 10th, however, there is no max. If this number falls below 5 people prior to the RSVP Deadline this event will be cancelled.

Guests: Up to 2 per member.

Fees: Annual Members - FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2

RSVP Deadline: 4pm on Sunday, October 12th (Changed to later in the day on Mon 10/5.)

Meeting Location: Near Host Station/Entrance

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

You may click on the restaurant name for door-to-door directions.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Columbus Day Lunch
